D

DataBaseController - Class in GNServer
The class manages all incoming and outgoing information from the database, including executing SQL queries while maintaining the integrity of the constructed database.
DataBaseController() - Constructor for class GNServer.DataBaseController
Establishes a connection to the database.
DataBaseController(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class GNServer.DataBaseController
Constructs a DataBaseController to manage database connections and initial data loading.
DEFAULT_PORT - Static variable in class server.EchoServer
The default port to listen on.
DEFAULT_PORT - Static variable in class server.ServerUI
Default port for the server to listen on.
DeleteFromWaitingList(String, String, String, Integer) - Method in class GNServer.DataBaseController
Deletes a specific entry from a waiting list table in the database.
DeletionOfOutdatedRecordsFromWaitingList(String) - Method in class GNServer.DataBaseController
Removes outdated reservations from the waiting list of a specified park.
DepartmentManagerController - Class in gui
The DepartmentManagerController class controls the GUI for the Department Manager's interface.
DepartmentManagerController() - Constructor for class gui.DepartmentManagerController
 
DisplayParametersForDM(String) - Method in class GNServer.DataBaseController
Fetches pending parameter update requests for a specific Department Manager.
DisplayUseReport(Report) - Method in class GNServer.DataBaseController
Generates a list of dates and times when the park was not at full capacity within a given date range.
DMparks(User) - Method in class GNServer.DataBaseController
Retrieves a list of park names managed by a specific department manager.
Done(ActionEvent) - Method in class GNServer.ServerGUIController
Starts the server with the provided configuration.
